name: Spicy Mexican Tuna Salad
author: AMYB9
summary: Spice up your tuna fish with this easy modified recipe that one of my student's families made for me - authentic Mexican! Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 cup frozen peas, thawed and drained
2  chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, or more to taste - chopped
¼ teaspoon dried minced onion, or to taste
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
1 pinch ground black pepper, or to taste
directions: Mix tuna, peas, chipotle peppers, mayonnaise, dried minced onion, garlic salt, and black pepper in a bowl until thoroughly combined
